docs.snippet: HOW THE PRINCE WENT TO COLLEGE. The English Press found cause for merriment, in the fact that our people manifested great curiosity concerning the Prince of Wales, during his recent visit to this country, and they lost no opportunity which could be...
docs.lead_paragraph: HOW THE PRINCE WENT TO COLLEGE. The English Press found cause for merriment, in the fact that our people manifested great curiosity concerning the Prince of Wales, during his recent visit to this country, and they lost no opportunity which could be used as a text for good-natured raillery and innocent sarcasm.

docs.snippet: The Governor transmitted a communication from South Carolina, returning the resolutions of the NewYork State Legislature, tendering the aid of the State to the General Government in enforcing the laws. Tabled and ordered to be printed.
docs.lead_paragraph: The Governor transmitted a communication from South Carolina, returning the resolutions of the NewYork State Legislature, tendering the aid of the State to the General Government in enforcing the laws. Tabled and ordered to be printed.

headline.main: CITY AND COUNTY AFFAIRS.; BOARD OF ALDERMEN. IS THE CENTRAL PARK COMMISSION LEGAL? AN INVESTIGATION ON THE TAPIS DEBATE ON THE TAX LEVY HALF A MILLION FOR BELGIAN PAVEMENT ONLY A QUARTER OF AMILLION DOLLARS ADDED TO THE TAX LEVY. A MANDAMUS. BALDWIN AND JAYCOK THE TAX LEVY

docs.snippet: A violent gale of wind visited the City last evening, and appears to have extended over several hundred miles of territory North and South.
